segments.text: Mark ? What were you up to yesterday ? I called you , but there wasn ’ t anybody home .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We went out to the stadium . Bob hadn ’ t been to a game for a few weeks .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How ’ d it go ? Did we win ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Nope , lost again . But , it was a good game .
segments.speaker: S2
